: : SharpClaw : :
He stumbled back from the kick to the head. He then pulls his rifle, shooting at Battera.
SharpClaw: Hmm, bat hunting... New one on me, but I could get to like it.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:Battera::

She tried to bring her wing up in time, but it took a slight slicing. 
6 inches to be exact. She cried out in pain, then tried to kick him 
in the head with her bat foot. "You big brute."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw saw Battera comeing at him. He extends his claws and 
swings at Battera's wings, trying to slice right through it.
>  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:KitKat::
> 
> She had transformed into wolf mode and ran out of the base. She ran 
> hard and made her way to the battle field. She transformed into bot 
> mode and drew her plasma pistol. She raised it as started shooting 
> Windlord."Die Bot!"
> 
> 
> Battera::
> 
> She swooped down and went to hit SharpClaw with her huge bat 
> wing. "Take that you vile creature. May the matrix have great pity 
on 
> your spark!"
>
